doc:
Ritchie Coster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ritchie_Coster 0 Ritchie Coster (born 1 July 1967) is an English actor. He is best known for playing the roles of Dietrich Banning in The Tuxedo (2002), Chechen in The Dark Knight (2008), Elias Kassar in Blackhat (2015), Mayor Austin Chessani on the second season of the HBO anthology television series True Detective and Francisco Scaramucci / Mr. Blue on the SyFy television series Happy!. Ritchie_Coster ( born 1_July_1967 ) is an_English_actor . He is_best_known for playing the_roles of Dietrich_Banning in The_Tuxedo_(_2002_) , Chechen in The_Dark_Knight_(_2008_) , Elias_Kassar in Blackhat_(_2015_) , Mayor_Austin_Chessani on the_second_season of the_HBO_anthology_television_series_True_Detective and Francisco_Scaramucci / Mr. Blue on the_SyFy_television_series_Happy ! .
